Title: Unwanted access to the entire file system vulnerability due to a missing check in `staticFiles` HTTP handler
Description: Missing check vulnerability in the static file handler allows any client to access the files in the server's file system. When `staticFiles` is set in the serve settings in the configuration file, the following handler doesn't check if `absolutePath` is still under the directory provided as `staticFiles;`
NotImpacted: All versions before 0.78.0, all versions starting from 0.82.22
